traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people regardless of gender.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy is uninterested in romantic entanglements.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. he will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy is a Vulpian, and he is absolutely adorable, as expected from gene-engineered servitor. Even animals are attracted by his adorable appearence. Even plants start to bloom around Timmy!
traits.name: vulpian

traits.description: Timmy is a Lombax. he has an incredible natural inclination towards Crafting, Engineering and Combat just like other representatives of his species. But due to natural inclination of Lombaxes to solve all problems with brute force, Timmy is not very good in "Social" things.
traits.name: lombax

traits.description: Timmy is a Sylveon, and he is absolutely adorable, as expected from gene-engineered servitor. Sylveons were gene-engineered to be a productive workers at assembly line and basic principles of Crafting are embedded in their DNA.
traits.name: sylveon

traits.description: Timmy is confident that everything will work out for the best.
traits.name: confident

traits.description: Timmy is seriously overweight. he moves slowly, and works even slower.
traits.name: overweight

traits.description: Timmy has honed his mind and body for most of his life.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy demonstrates neat skill, especially with his hands.
traits.name: dexterous

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
traits.name: clean

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless he is relatively close to it.
traits.name: near-sighted

traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
traits.name: quicklearner

traits.description: Some people use a spoon to eat. Timmy uses a shovel...
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: Timmy is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy could sleep through an earthquake.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is an extreme pervert. he doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.
traits.name: pervert

traits.description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. Timmy is fascinated by corpses and decay.
traits.name: morbid

traits.description: Timmy takes medicine very seriously. he wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.
traits.name: carefulsurgeon

traits.description: Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and Timmy starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds Timmy can skin it and split it".
traits.name: naturalbutcher

traits.description: Timmy is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.
traits.name: lovedbyanimals

traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of Timmy. Researching new technology comes easily to Timmy, but he always seems distracted.
traits.name: geniusinventor

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to waste materials. he takes great care in his work.
traits.name: efficientbuilder

traits.description: Timmy knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. he doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.
traits.name: fastminer

traits.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and Timmy is that sucker.
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle. he gets better prices than most people.
traits.name: amateurhaggler

traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.
traits.name: hagglingenthusiast

traits.description: The elephant in the room is named Timmy.
traits.name: awkward

traits.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - Timmy, probably.
traits.name: tucker

traits.description: Timmy could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.
traits.name: melodicvoice

traits.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, Timmy is not.
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
traits.name: diplomatic

traits.description: Timmy has such a way with him words and gifts that he always manages to cool down a tense situation.
traits.name: verydiplomatic

traits.description: Timmy has never held a gun in him hands. The weight of the cold metal in him hands makes he shudder uncontrollably.
traits.name: shootingamateur

traits.description: Timmy knows him way with a gun.
traits.name: shootingenthusiast

traits.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - Timmy, probably.
traits.name: shootingprofessional

traits.description: Brave Timmy, born with impossible strength and force of will.
traits.name: herculean

traits.description: Timmy is said to have been dipped in the river of death, he seems invulnerable in battle.
traits.name: achillean

traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.
traits.name: odyssean

traits.description: Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.
traits.name: areswrath

traits.description: Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.
traits.name: artemisblessing

traits.description: So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.
traits.name: aphroditesgrace

traits.description: Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
traits.name: imhotepswisdom

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, he must be part mule or something because he can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a large advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, he enjoys putting things together and he's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. he can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset his stomach.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. he will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, he will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. he is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. he is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. he likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. he is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. he is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. he is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. he is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. he has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. he is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. he is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. he is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. he is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, he is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns so much that he gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see he eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. he can carry more and it takes more to bring him down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. he has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! he moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. he is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on his healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get him moving.
traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. his belly can go much longer without food and he is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. he can carry more and his arms pack more of a punch!
traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, he seems to be a pretty lucky individual and he's pretty happy about it too.
traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! he has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! he isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what he wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow he able to use his attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have his's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, he is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make his own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but his ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. he is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! he wants everyone to think his great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! he can push through building material like it's not even there. he really doesn't know his own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. he is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because he puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! he can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Timmy is the Maru. They feel the warmth, remind themselves that they are alive, and clear their minds.
traits.name: flameworship

traits.description:
Any object, event, or technology has cause and effect.
Timmy is very skilled at identifying and learning such causal relationships.
traits.name: sharpeye

traits.description:
Timmy's body is naturally flexible.
Stronger and more flexible than others, it has a significant advantage in hunting.
traits.name: flexible

traits.description:
Timmy believes that he is right.
The firm belief has a positive effect on his will, just like his piety, but he also tends to ignore the opinions of others.
traits.name: self-righteousness

traits.description:
A person with strong leadership always influences those around them, either positively or negatively.
No one knows what path such a person will choose or what kind of life he will lead. But one thing is certain, he won't be an ordinary person who comes and goes into the world without anyone knowing. /n/nTimmy was born with that gift.
traits.name: leadership

traits.description:
Timmy has ears that are sensitive to even small sounds.
 Being sensitive to sounds is always an advantage in life outside of its nest, but it also has the disadvantage of not being able to fall asleep deeply.
traits.name: sensitiveears

traits.description:
Timmy is an experimentally cultivated Maru.
It has significantly superior physical abilities than other floors, but its autoimmunity is very low due to its imperfect design.
traits.name: prototype

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: inquisitivemind

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: senseofduty

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: philosophy

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: warp

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
traits.name: straight

traits.description: Timmy will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
traits.name: faithful

traits.description: Timmy just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
traits.name: philanderer

traits.description: Timmy prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. he doesn't mind if his partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
traits.name: polyamorous

traits.description:
Timmy has taken the lessons of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic to heart; his social skills have improved, but he is against the idea of using violence.

he will never judge others based on their appearance, voice or breathing, and insults have no effect on him whatsoever.

he gets a mood bonus from equipping pony plushies, and has a positive attitude towards other bronies.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: brony

traits.description:
Timmy can't understand why any sane adult would enjoy My Little Pony, and tends to dislike anyone who does.

he gets a mood loss from equipping pony plushies.
traits.name: antibrony

traits.description: Despite being banished once again, Nightmare Moon is still full of determination and tries to remain positive. She will build her own empire in this world - and one day she will return to Equestria with her new power! May the Night reign forever!
traits.name: eternallunacy

traits.description: Timmy is very friendly and will try her best to help the colony grow.
traits.name: extremelyfriendly

traits.description: This pony belongs to earth pony race. It is sturdier than other ponies and has special connection to earth but it has no real ways to make complex manipulations with objects.
traits.name: earthpony

traits.description: This pony belongs to unicorn race. It can use magic to manipulate different objects with ease, but it is also more psychologically sensitive and can not endure much pain.
traits.name: unicorn

traits.description: This pony belongs to alicorn race. It combines powers of earth ponies, unicorns and pegasi , which turns this pony into very powerfull being.
traits.name: alicorn

traits.description: This pony belongs to pegasi race. It is faster than other ponies and can help itself in work with its wings.
traits.name: pegasus

traits.description: This pony belongs to batpony race. It is slightly faster than other ponies and prefers to work at night and sleep during day.
traits.name: batpony

traits.description: Patron of the arts and student of the bow, Timmy will bring beauty to his world, one way or another.
traits.name: apollo'sharmony

traits.description: Timmy knows where the riches are buried, he also knows that the dead can't take it with them.
traits.name: hades'wealth

traits.description: Timmy has a special connection with plants, they grow, flower, and die at his order.
traits.name: demeter'sbounty

traits.description: Companion to creatures both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures his flock.
traits.name: pan'sblessing

traits.description: Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.
traits.name: hephaestus'forge

traits.description: Timmy's healing can cure the sick and keep death itself at bay.
traits.name: asclepius'healing

traits.description: Timmy commands the wisdom of the ages. he is a master tactician and inventor extraordinaire with few intellectual rivals.
traits.name: athena'swisdom

traits.description: Timmy only speed is fast. he is quick to close a deal and even quicker to close a distance.
traits.name: hermes'haste

traits.description: Timmy has fragile skin and bones. he takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
traits.name: delicate

traits.description: The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier he is. Being alone is best of all.
traits.name: recluse

traits.description: Timmy is a Vaporeon, and he is absolutely adorable, despite having such exotic appearance. Vaporeons, due to their aquatic origin and natural ascetism, tend to be in tune with nature, making them wonderful farmers.
traits.name: vaporeon

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: Timmy is a Braixen. Timmy has an incredible natural inclination towards psionics and manipulation of life essence. he can easily read emotions of humans, animals and even plants.
traits.name: braixen

traits.description: Timmy is a Delphox. Timmy is a powerful psychic and is inclined towards manipulation of life essence. he can easily read emotions of humans, animals and even plants.
traits.name: delphox

traits.description: Timmy is a Kisalfar. While Kisalfar are "inferior" compared to Fressalfar in terms of intelligence, they're incredibly good in "social" things and negotiations.
traits.name: kisalfar

traits.description: Timmy is a Fressalfar. Timmy is just like a Thrumbo that is hidden in his DNA - Highly Intelligent and not really Social. It is very hard to approach him and start a conversation.
traits.name: fressalfar

traits.description: Timmy is a Cheetah. Timmy is a great runner with a sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: cheetah

traits.description: Timmy is a Leo. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight and is rather Social, compared to other Feline species.
traits.name: leo

traits.description: Timmy is a Jaguar. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: jaguar

traits.description: Timmy is a Panther. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: panther

traits.description: Timmy is a Tigris. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: tigris

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy is a Zoroark, and he is absolutely adorable, as expected from gene-engineered servitor. Zoroark are intelligent creatures, and they tend to have developed social and problem-solving skills.
traits.name: zoroark

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: Sylveon is a vulpine and lupine hybrid species engineered by maniacal owner of an industrial company in a now ravaged glitterworld to be a cheap working force at all kinds of company's facilities. Sylveon's adorable appearence has no practical purpose and was a purely aesthetic choice. All sylveons sport a telltale ribbonlike appendage set connected to their heads near a bowlike organ allowing them to move their ribbons with extreme precision and preform menial tasks easily while using their hands for specific and higher skill actions. Sylveons also boast a high intellectual ability yet have much weaker physical strength due to it being useless in high tech facilities and conditions of glitterworld. Sylveons are incredible crafters and even good researchers. But their bodies are incredibly weak and any injury of the bows dramatically reduces their productivity. Sylveon is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Sylveon

races.description: Lombax is a distant descendant of human race with feline features. Representatives of this species are great warriors and engineers. Despite their size, their bodies are surprisingly tough. Lombaxes are originated from Fastoon - glitterworld with dry desert climate. They prefer to live in hot enviroment. Lombax is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Lombax

races.description: Vulpes is a race of adorable genetically engineered foxes with high mental capabilities but weak and fragile body. Vulpes is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Vulpes

races.description: A baseline orassan, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Orassia planets. A mammalian humanoid feline race. Evolving in cold caves and life on space ships make it so they don't mind the dark or being inside for long periods of time.
races.name: orassan

races.description: A hybrid with DNA from a human and an orassan. Typically created through careful genetic engineering in a lab, or the "natural" way from individuals with closely regulated gene mods, these hybrids combine some of the best traits from their parent species. The particular traits and physical characteristics that are being inherited are typically chosen by the parents having the child, but they almost always have two feline ears and a feline tail, both with fur sharing the same color as the hair on their head.
races.name: neko

races.description: A race that lives on the ruins of an unknown civilization. Also called Far North or Yeti, they live in a small society over a wide radius.
races.name: Maru

races.description:
Its an Umbreon! it is recognisable by its black fur and yellow rings. its red eyes remind some people of evil while its glowing rings is a sign of hope to others.
	
+ Due to moonlight, umbreons have the insight for researching.
+ A little faster than humans.
+ Their fur insulates them a bit.
+ 20% more HP than humans.
+ Not bothered by darkness.
~ Low sensitivity for psychic effects.
~ higher chance for nightowl trait.
~ Uses their claws!
~ Slightly smaller than humans.
- Needs a little more food.
races.name: umbreon

races.description:
This species was grown in the laboratories of the Empire to satisfy the sexual pleasures of its citizens and nobles. They have increased protection from blunt damage due to their elastic shell and have increased susceptibility to temperature.
Thanks to their fertility, they were able to spread to many favorable planets of the universe.
races.name: Humanoid slime

races.description: This is Earth Pony - the most boring typo of ponies
races.name: Earth Pony

races.description: This is Unicorn - pony with horn , that can use it to cast spells. All unicorns know basic spells like "magic hand" , but there are some that could use advanced magic.
races.name: Unicorn

races.description: This is Pegasus - pony with ability to fly due to its extensive wings.
races.name: Pegasus

races.description: This is Batpony - nocturnal pony with bat wings and sharp fangs. Despite popular misconception , most batponies don't like blood
races.name: Batpony

races.description: This is Alicorn - the most powerfull kind of ponies. Alicorns combine all strenght of earth ponies, unicorns and pegasi in them. There are rumors that each alicorn has dark side of themselves - but those are only rumors , right?
races.name: Alicorn

races.description: This is Changeling - strange combination of pony and bug. Those horrifying creatures are usually violent predators that could inflict serious damage even if unarmed.
races.name: Changeling

races.description: This is Griffon - hybrid between lion and ... uh ... chicken?
races.name: Griffon

races.description: This is kirin - unusual equine creature with magical abilities. Kirins are known for their immunity to hot temperatures and anger issues. Scales on body make kirins more durable in combat , but slightly slow them down.
races.name: Kirin

races.description: This alicorn is Nightmare Moon herself! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Nightmare Moon herself!

races.description: This alicorn is Twilight Sparkle! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Twilight Sparkle

races.description: This unicorn is Rarity! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Rarity

races.description: This pegasi is Fluttershy! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Fluttershy

races.description: This pegasi is Rainbow Dash! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Rainbow Dash

races.description: This earth pony is Apple Jack! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Apple Jack

races.description: This earth pony is Pinkie Pie! Quite a rare sight , she is unique after all.
races.name: Pinkie Pie

races.description: Genetically modified species, closely related to Sylveons. Their origin is barely known, but there's rumors that they come from a group of Sylveons that managed to escape from slavery at colony ship a few hundred years ago. Said ship crashed at aquatic world and survivors had to gene-engineer themselves with barely functioning genepods to survive. Despite its appearence, this species has strong physical strength and are easily able to win a brawl fight against average human. Vaporeons is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Vaporeon

races.description:
A race of humanlike robots which are mostly female in model variety.

The origins of these machines are mostly unknown. Some speculate they are escapees from a civilization which used them for labor and some just suggest they are outdated pleasure machines which got dumped by a passing space freighter.

By design by their previous masters they are weak physically but their raw fortitude is enough to make up for it. Beware of their biological reactor and capacitors violently exploding, if they die by overheating.
races.name: Android

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer.

Not capable of sapience, however their relative cheap cost and ability to work around the clock make them valuable workers.
races.name: Droid

races.description:
A race of rudimentary humanlike warrior robots.

Usually found guarding the homes of the wealthy and offices of mega corporations. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.
races.name: Battledroid

races.description:
A race of spacer-tech humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got a resident tinkerer.Not capable of sapience making them perfect for colony tasks. 

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. 

Droids are not born and must be created.
races.name: Advanced droid

races.description:
A race of spacer-tech humanlike warrior robots.

Installed into military bases and highly sensitive areas. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. Wardroids possess four arms, each of which is highly deadly. Humans beware: bring an army to defeat this model.

Droids are not born and must be created.
races.name: Wardroid

races.description: Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in building & mining, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
races.name: engineer

races.description:
Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to food & farming. It's designed to ensure everyone is fed and the kitchen is stocked.

This drone is unable to do combat nor any other skilled jobs.
races.name: chef

races.description: Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This drone is highly capable in medicine, and is able to take care of most typical injuries.
races.name: medic

races.description: Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to fabrication and smithing, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
races.name: assembly

races.description: Small drone constructed of simple materials built in short time. This device is masterful in tasks relating to hauling and transportation of goods by caravan, but is unable to do much else. Cannot fight.
races.name: transport

races.description: A small, bipedal, Fox-like humanoid that has a natural affinity to fire and psychic capabilities. It's unknown what kind of gene-engineering magic the Glitterworld that originally produced them used, but their bodies have almost a complete resistance to fire and high temperatures. These creatures are able to consciously regulate temperature of their bodies. Before collapse of it's original solar system, this species was mainly used as domestic servants, entertainers, or just a beauteful and kind friend to have around. Braixen is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Braixen

races.description: A medium-sized, bipedal, Fox-like humanoid that has a natural affinity to fire and psychic capabilities. Related to Delphox and can be considered as a more "mature" version of it from standpoint of whoever originally designed them. It's unknown what kind of gene-engineering magic the Glitterworld that originally produced them used, but their bodies have almost a complete resistance to fire and high temperatures. These creatures are able to consciously regulate temperature of their bodies. Before collapse of it's original solar system, this species was mainly used as domestic servants, entertainers, or just a beauteful and kind friend to have around. Delphox is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Delphox

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Cheetah are perhaps one of the fastest Felines with an instant reaction. They literally dance around an opponent in melee fight and even dodge bullets if lucky enough. Cheetah are one of the most intelligent felines and are more social, compared to most felines. Cheetah is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Cheetah

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Jaguars are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone. Jaguar is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Jaguar

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Leo, unlike other Felines, are very social beings and feel themselves confident in all kinds of discussions. Leo is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Leo

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Panthers do not have any special features compared to other felines, expect their dark black fur. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone. Panther is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Panther

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Tigris are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone. Tigris is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Tigris

races.description: A marvel of genetic engineering created on a far off glitterworld on the verge of transcendence. The Fressalfar were the result of a lone scientists quest to engineer the perfect being that did not rely on the taint of mechanite technology. Pods of them were sent off to rimworlds all across the universe in an effort to save his creation before the AI scourge devoured their homeworld. Believed to be the genetic combination of hyper-intelligent felines, thrumbos, and human DNA; the Fressalfar are fast, highly intelligent, and incredibly beautiful. Fressalfar is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Fressalfar

races.description: Genetic descendants of the Fressalfar. The Kisalfar are slightly inferior the Fressalfar due to the highly unstable genome not replicating perfectly outside of lab conditions. Physically this led to the lost of their highly coveted horns and some would say they could never live up to the original race. However, the combination of high intelligence and growing up in a natural environment means the  Kisalfar are much more attuned with the ways of their home world and those around them. What they lost in speed and beauty they make up for in natural charm and instinct and they have proven an ability to get along with humans in a way the Fressalfar never could. Kisalfar is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Kisalfar

races.description: Zoroark is a race of adorable genetically engineered foxes with slightly enchanted mental capabilities and agility. Originally designed by conglomerate of megacorporations in their home system as an advertisment tool for products, and as entertainers for selected few. These creatures became highly popular among elites in all neighouring systems. This particular subspecies of Zoroark is black in color. Zoroark is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Zoroark

races.description: Zoroark is a race of adorable genetically engineered foxes with slightly enchanted mental capabilities and agility. Originally designed by conglomerate of megacorporations in their home system as an advertisment tool for products, and as entertainers for selected few. These creatures became highly popular among elites in all neighouring systems. This particular subspecies of Zoroark is white in color. Zoroark is an advanced variation of xenohumans with a precisely tuned genome that becomes highly unstable outside of very short range of acceptable parameters. Technically they even can be considered an alien species. Their modification is impossible outside of advanced Glitterworld facilities and without source Genome templates.
races.name: Zoroark
